Text: I love this game still today....pure genious in it's day. Hard to see something so well made in todays games.
This game isn't really playable on modern PCs. Or are there some fixes that I don't know of?

I've played this game just recently on Windows 7 using DOXBox and found it to be well playable. In DOSBox you can limit the CPU cycles and you can even use a modern USB joystick. Just take a look at the torrent's Info.txt for more.

Whoever likes this game should also know the Windows game Freelancer (from 2003).

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freelancer_%28video_game%29
